Positive_Eng: Increases the attack power of all allies by 10% during battle.
Negative_Eng: Decreases the defense of all allies by 10% during battle.

Positive_Kr: 전투 [후반]이후 아군의 모든 능력치를 10% 만큼 증가시킨다.
Positive_Eng: Increases all allies' stats by 10% after battle [second half].
Negative_Kr: 전투시 [전반]과 [중반]에 아군의 모든 능력치를 % 만큼 감소시킨다.
Negative_Eng: Decreases all allies' stats by 10% during [first half] and [middle] battles.

Positive_Kr: 전투시 아군의 모든 능력치를 10% 만큼 증가시킨다.
Positive_Eng: In battle, all allies' stats are increased by 10%.
Negative_Kr: 라운드 시작시 아군의 전체 체력를 10% 만큼 체력이 감소시킨다.
Negative_Eng: Decreases all allies' HP by 10% at the start of the round.

Positive_Eng: Recovers allies' HP by 10 per 5 seconds after [mid battle].
Negative_Eng: Decreases the attack power of allies by 10% after [mid] during battle

Positive_Kr: 전투 [중반]이후 아군의 체력의 10% 만큼 방어막을 즉시 생성시킨다.
Positive_Eng: After [mid battle], immediately create a shield equal to 10% of allies' HP.
Negative_Kr: 전투시 전체 아군의 회복효과가 % 만큼 감소한다.
Negative_Eng: Decreases the healing effect of all allies by 10% during battle

Positive_Eng: Increases the attack power of allies by 10% after [mid battle].
Negative_Eng: Decreases the defense of all allies by 10% during battle.

Name_Eng: Defense that does not back down
Positive_Eng: Decreases damage received by allies by 10% during battle
Negative_Eng: Damage inflicted by allies during battle is reduced by 10%.

Positive_Eng: In battle, gain 10 cost every 5 seconds.
Negative_Eng: The maximum possible cost is reduced to 5

Positive_Kr: 아군의 모든 상성효과가 사라진다. (공격 및 방어가 무속성으로 전환)
Positive_Eng: All ally's synergistic effects disappear. (Attack and defense are converted to non-attribute)
Negative_Kr: 아군의 모든 상성효과가 사라진다. (공격 및 방어가 무속성으로 전환)
Negative_Eng: All ally's synergistic effects disappear. (Attack and defense are converted to non-attribute)

Positive_Kr: 전투 [중반]이후 아군의 스킬 재사용 대기시간이 10% 감소한다.
Positive_Eng: Decreases the cooldown of allies' skills by 10% after [mid battle].
Negative_Eng: Damage inflicted by allies during battle is reduced by 10%.

Positive_Kr: 전투시 진행시간별 회복 코스트가 1~10 중 랜덤하게 회복한다.
Positive_Eng: In battle, the recovery cost for each duration is randomly recovered from 1 to 10.
Negative_Kr: 전투시 사용카드의 코스트가 1 ~ 10 중 랜덤하게 지정된다.
Negative_Eng: During battle, the cost of the card used is randomly assigned from 1 to 10.

Positive_Eng: In the final settlement of the dungeon, the reward is increased by 2 times
Negative_Kr: 전투시 적의 모든 능력치를 10% 만큼 증가시킨다.
Negative_Eng: In battle, increases all stats of the enemy by 10%.
